description:
The new title page of IMDb is now supported. The old one is supported, too.
(RottenTomatoes doesn't work currently)

Partly adapted for changed RottenTomatoes website:
Tomatometer, Audience Score and Critics consensus are shown on IMDb again.
Increased efficiency when finding less famous or foreign movies.
Hotfix for showing Metacritics background color because of changes on IMDb
Improved search algorithm: less popular movies are found with more confidence.

Features:
- RottenTomatoes Critics consensus is displayed on IMDB,
- Similarly, IMDb summary is shown on RottenTomatoes.
Minor improvements:
- working when RottenTomatoes logos are missing,
- style fix for 100% tomatometer,
- style fix for IMDb when injected TomatoMeter causes overflow (usually for movies without trailer)
Fancy new UI: icons, colors, fully clickable scores

Improved stability:
- Movie scores are inserted even if they are unavailable yet (e.g. for unreleased movies).
- Less famous movies are found with more confidence (this will be improved further).
Minor update for changed RottenTomatoes website.
RottenTomatoes now shows the IMDb scores! Even the TOP250 position is displayed!
Bugfix to make the extension working again.
Number formatting is based on the browser's preferred language, just like on IMDb.
First release, showing RottenTomatoes scores on IMDb.
